data.actual_result: If you click it enough times, you will see that when you click once, it will copy AND un-copy in one click.
data.expected_result: One click, it should copy, and another click, it should "un-copy" (?).
data.short_description: Clicking the "Copy" button on the invite multiple times, copies and uncopies in one click.
data.steps_to_repro: - On any channel that you have permission to create an invite, click on the invite icon. - You should be led to the invite screen, with the option to copy the link. - Press that button multiple times. However, make sure you are only clicking once every time you are clicking it. (You need to try a fair amount of times for this to work). - Observe the copy.
